p.b: For each day's reading question, write your name, section, table, and group number on the upper right hand corner of your answer and hand it in at the start of class that day

problem.p: Reading Assignment: Young and Freedman: 1.10 (Vector Product), 9.1-9.6

1. Compare and contrast rotational kinematics and one-dimensional linear kinematics. In particular compare and contrast the concepts of displacement and angular displacement, velocity and angular velocity, acceleration and angular acceleration.
2. Explain in your own words what the moment of inertia about an axis means and how to apply the parallel axis theorem.
